mapper.delete: delete from t_customer_contact where contact_id = #{contactId} and company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_customer_contact (customer_id, name, duty, mobile, mail, birthday, gender, province, city, county, detail_address, remark, is_default, create_id,create_name,create_date,company_id) values (#{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update t_customer_contact set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duty = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_address = #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where contact_id = #{contactId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_customer_contact
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
duty = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detail_address = #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
where contact_id = #{contactId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select contact_id, customer_id, name, duty, mobile, mail, birthday, gender, province, city, county, detail_address, remark, is_default, company_id from t_customer_contact where contact_id = #{contactId} and company_id = #{companyId}
select contact_id, customer_id, name, duty, mobile, mail, birthday, gender, province, city, county, detail_address, remark, is_default, company_id from t_customer_contact where contact_id = #{0}
select contact_id, customer_id, name, duty, mobile, mail, birthday, gender, province, city, county, detail_address, remark, is_default, company_id from t_customer_contact
